config.name: Switch from QA:Head:Devel to QA:Head
config.description: If machine is running QA:Head:Devel, than it is switched to QA:Head. This job always fails since the hamsta is restarted in the last step! See job output to check whether it was successful.

worker.command:
#!/bin/bash
export LANG=C repourl=`zypper lr -u | grep QA: | awk -F '|' '{ print $NF; }'` if echo $repourl | grep -q 'Head:/Devel/' ; then echo "QA:Head:Devel repository detected... switching to QA:Head" reponum=`zypper lr -u | grep 'QA:/Head:/Devel' | awk -F '|' '{ print $1; }'` newrepourl=`echo $repourl | sed 's,Head:/Devel/,Head/,'` packages=`zypper search -i -r $reponum | awk -F\| '{ print $2; }' | grep -v 'Name' | grep -v '^ *$' | grep -v 'qa-use-devel-servers'` zypper rr $reponum zypper ar -f $newrepourl QArepo rpm -e --nodeps $packages rpm -e qa-use-devel-servers qa_lib_use-devel-servers qa_conf_unstable 2> /dev/null zypper in -y qa_hamsta qa_tools echo "Completed successfully! (hamsta will now be restarted which will make the job fail - it is expected!)" rchamsta restart else echo "QA:Head repository is already used... making sure most recent qa_tools are used" zypper up -y qa_tools fi
